Pre-Game Insights: Jason Holder expressed it is 'bittersweet' to see Barbados-born Jacob Bethell playing for England.
Holder stated that West Indies have 'no fear' ahead of the white-ball tour against England.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jacob Bethell made his England debut last month.
Bethell is set to play against the West Indies during England's white-ball tour.
England will be led during the ODI leg of the tour by Liam Livingstone.
Jos Buttler is continuing his recovery from a calf injury and hopes to return for the T20 series.

The white-ball side has lost each of their last three series.
